title: Beer BBQ Sauce
directions: In a pot over med-high heat, mix oil, garlic and onion, cook about 4 minutes
Then addÂ Worcestershire sauce, beer, ketchup, honey Dijon, molasses, brown sugar, salt, pepper and hot sauce
Want smoother sauce? Pulse in blender
Serve on your favorite meat with a glass of Armory XPA!
ingredients: 1 Tbs honey or molasses if you have it
1/3 tsp hot sauce of your choice
